question: Which among the following was related to Maddayyagari Mallana ?
explanation:
• Allasani Peddana wrote Manucharitam and dedicated to the Emperor Krishna Deva Raya.
  • Nandi Timmana wrote Parijataapaharanam and dedicated it to the emperor as well.
  • Maddayyagari Mallana wrote Rajasekhara Charitramu.
  • Dhurjati wrote Kalahasthi Mahatyamu.
